name: Don't play this Greta!
description:
Bring your TV, Sofa and Table to the dumpster.

Keybind:

Press Space to jump (objects can jump ???)

Press A and D to move left and right

Press Y to spawn another object

Press O to restart the current level

I made this game in one day sadly, I didn't have time to do more but thanks to Rick I'm working with Unity as job finally :)

Credits:

Gameplay, Idea, GameDesign, GameLevel:
